text: Richard Hastings Tomey (June 20, 1938 – May 10, 2019) was an American football player and coach. Tomey was the head football coach at the University of Hawaii (1977–1986), University of Arizona (1987–2000) and San Jose State University (2005–2009). He was born in Bloomington, Indiana. He played for DePauw University from 1957 to 1960. He was born in Bloomington, Indiana. Tomey was diagnosed with lung cancer in January 2019.Former Arizona Wildcats coach Dick Tomey receiving treatment for lung cancer He died on May 10, 2019, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football players Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:People from Bloomington, Indiana Category:Sportspeople from Indiana
title: Dick Tomey
